title: First Judges: Othniel, Ehud, and Shamgar
summary: Judges 3 describes the first three judges. Othniel delivers Israel from Mesopotamia. Ehud defeats Moab by secretly killing King Eglon. Shamgar strikes down 600 Philistines with an oxgoad.

faq.question: Who was the first judge of Israel?
faq.answer: Othniel, who delivered Israel from Cushan-Rishathaim of Aram.

faq.question: How did Ehud kill the Moabite king?
faq.answer: He used a concealed sword and struck King Eglon while they were alone.
